id.description: Your internal ID for the customer

created_at.description: The date and time the customer was created in milliseconds since epoch

credit_schema.description: Credit schema for credit system features (only applicable when type is credit_system)
Credit schema for credit system features (only applicable when type is credit_system)

id.description: Your unique identifier for the customer

fingerprint.description: Unique identifier (eg, serial number) to detect duplicate customers and prevent free trial abuse

stripe_id.description: Stripe customer ID if you already have one

entity_id.description: Entity ID to associate with the customer

id.description: New unique identifier for the customer (cannot be changed to null)

fingerprint.description: Unique identifier (eg, serial number) to detect duplicate customers

metadata.description: Additional metadata for the customer (set individual keys to null to delete them)

feature_id.description: The ID of the feature this entity is associated with

id.description: The ID of the product you set when creating the product

is_add_on.description: Whether the product is an add-on and can be purchased alongside other products

is_default.description: Whether the product is the default product

archived.description: Whether this product has been archived and is no longer available

created_at.description: The timestamp of when the product was created in milliseconds since epoch

items.description: Array of product items that define the features and pricing

free_trial.description: Free trial configuration for this product, if available

base_variant_id.description: ID of the base variant this product is derived from

scenario.description: Scenario context for when this product is used in attach flows

properties.description: Additional properties and metadata for the product

is_free.description: True if the product has no base price or usage prices

is_one_off.description: True if the product only contains a one-time price

interval_group.description: The billing interval group for recurring products (e.g., 'monthly', 'yearly')

has_trial.description: True if the product includes a free trial

updateable.description: True if the product can be updated after creation (only applicable if there are prepaid recurring prices)

ProductItem.description: A product item that defines a feature

offset.description: Number of customers skipped before returning results

AutumnError.description: An error that occurred in the API
